__TOC__
=Description=
Starter Packs can be purchased using [[Donation Coin|Donation Coins]] and provide newcomers to the server with a quick way to get up and running with one of three basic templates: a magician, a warrior or a bard. Each pack costs 6,000 Donation Coins and can be purchased from Nadine the Exotic Item Donation Vendor located in front of Britain Bank entrance. The packs were introduced in [https://uoforum.com/threads/donation-update-17-skill-booster-packs.85592/#post-653396 Donation Update 17].

'''Note:''' Trade skills (e.g. Blacksmithy, Tailoring, Carpentry, Alchemy, etc) and Animal Taming skills are not available on these Starter Packs. You will have to train those up the traditional way!

==Magician's Starter Pack==
[[File:starterpackMagician.png|300px|right]]
* 50 Mark Scrolls
* 100 Recall Scrolls
* 1 Full Blessed Spell Book
* 1 Rune Book
* 1 Ethereal Horse Mount
* 1 Special Hair Dye
* 6 Bags Filled With 50 of Each Reagent (300 of Each Total)
* 1 Bag of Exceptional Leather Armor
* 5 Blank Recall Runes
* 1 Clothing Bless Deed
* 225 Stat Ball
* 7 Skill Choice Book ((Choose 7 Skills to be 100.00/GM in - 700.00 Total)

==Warrior's Starter Pack==
[[File:starerpackWarrior.png|300px|right]]
* 50 Mark Scrolls
* 100 Recall Scrolls
* 1 Full Blessed Spell Book
* 1 Rune Book
* 1 Ethereal Horse Mount
* 1 Special Hair Dye
* 1 Clothing Bless Deed
* 5 Blank Recall Runes
* 1000 Bandaids
* 1 Bag of 50 Each Reagent
* 2 Exceptional Leather Armor Suits
* 1 Exception Shadow Plate Armor Suit
* 1 Exceptional Gold Plate Armor Suit
* 100 Arrows
* 100 Bolts
* Misc Weapons (Non Exceptional)
* 225 Stat Ball
* 7 Skill Choice Book (Choose 7 Skills to be 100.00/GM in - 700.00 Total)

==Bard's Starter Pack==
[[File:starterpackBard.png|300px|right]]
* 50 Mark Scrolls
* 100 Recall Scrolls
* 1 Full Blessed Spell Book
* 2 Rune Book
* 1 Ethereal Horse Mount
* 1 Special Hair Dye
* 1 Clothing Bless Deed
* 5 Blank Recall Runes
* 1000 Bandaids
* 1 Bag Of 50 Each Reagent
* 1 Exceptional Leather Armor Suits
* 1 Blessed Bamboo Flute With 10,000 Charges
* 225 Stat Ball
* 7 Skill Choice Book (Choose 7 Skills to be 100.00/GM in - 700.00 Total) '''Note:''' The Bard skill Discordance is not available from the pack but Musicianship, Peacemaking and Provocation are.
